name: spectral-thief
flavor_text: The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.
effect_text_extend: Steals the target's stat increases, then inflicts regular damage.  Will not steal stat increases that would put any of the user's stats at more than +6; any excess is left on the target.  Stolen increases are affected by abilities as normal.
effect_text_simple: Steals the target's stat increases, then inflicts damage.
